text: I’m glad to see DHS shut down its ‘Ministry of Truth’ after more than 190 of my colleagues joined me on my letter to express our concerns to Secretary Mayorkas. It’s time for DHS to focus its efforts on priority issues like the border crisis and keeping the homeland safe.
The deliberate disregard for the rule of law on our southern border by @POTUS is a national security threat. We must secure our nation's borders. https://t.co/MlpQ442qJm

.@POTUS is once again giving aid and comfort to dictators. This is why we need to pass the Prohibiting Oil Trade with Venezuela’s Tyrant Act to prohibit the importation of oil from the Maduro regime.

https://t.co/RhL40Fbcss https://t.co/q6G9p1VOhO

Abortion providers should never be allowed to profit off the death of innocent victims. I’m proud to introduce this bill so we can block for-profit fetal tissue sales once and for all. https://t.co/bwqHHFuucl
The law enforcement officers of @GrovelandSafety do a tremendous job. Happy #PoliceWeek to all of you. https://t.co/qDj8rjAMik

Great meeting with Eric Crump, the Aerospace Program Director for @PolkState. I applaud his efforts to expand public-private partnerships to empower entrepreneurs in Central Florida. This new business incubator will be a catalyst for innovation & job creation for our community. https://t.co/wdJbpxuQMe

Today, we remember and honor those who sacrificed their lives protecting our communities.

May God bless them and their families.
